Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT i.name FROM sys.indexes AS i INNER JOIN sys.tables AS t ON i.object_id = t.object_id WHERE t.name = 'w2_User' AND i.name = 'IX_w2_User_5') CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_User_5] ON [dbo].[w2_User]([del_flg], [integrated_flg]) ON [PRIMARY] GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT i.name FROM sys.indexes AS i INNER JOIN sys.tables AS t ON i.object_id = t.object_id WHERE t.name = 'w2_WorkUser' AND i.name = 'IX_w2_WorkUser_5') CREATE INDEX [IX_w2_WorkUser_5] ON [dbo].w2_WorkUser([del_flg], [integrated_flg]) ON [PRIMARY] GO
